item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - SEO & URLs - Generate Robots.txt file
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - SEO & URLs - Generate Robots.txt file Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1115 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop parameters > Traffic & SEO SEO & URLs page is well displayed Scroll to block : Robots file generation > Click on Generate robots.txt file button Successful update message is displayed Go to YOUR_SHOP.
